name: Toliti
description:
Toliti – fun and educational new word game that will take you on a journey through stunning landscapes discovering new words along with improving your vocabulary and spelling skills.

The goal of the game is to find hidden words in a grid. To assemble a word just swipe the letters in any directions. You have three minutes to find as many as you can.

Want to train your brain to think and learn faster while having fun? Join the cute honey bee TOLITI and let the adventure begin!

* Easy to play but challenging to master
* Over hundred thousand words hidden
* Different goal on each level
* Superpowers to help you crack challenging levels
* Daily rewards
* No internet connection needed
